name: letterblack-gen-ai
description: AI Generation Extension for Adobe After Effects

scripts.build:full: npm run clean && npm run copy-to-build
scripts.start: echo 'Open Adobe After Effects and load the extension'
scripts.test-security: echo 'Open src/index.html in browser and check console for security tests'
scripts.clean: rimraf build/* || rm -rf build/* || echo 'Build directory cleaned'
scripts.copy-to-build: cp -r src/* build/ || xcopy src build\ /E /I /Y
scripts.copy-to-cep: echo 'Copy build/* to your CEP extensions folder'
scripts.install-extension: npm run build && npm run deploy-to-cep
scripts.deploy-to-cep: powershell -Command "& { $env:CEP_DIR = \"$env:APPDATA\Adobe\CEP\extensions\com.letterblack.genai\"; if (!(Test-Path $env:CEP_DIR)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $env:CEP_DIR } if (!(Test-Path \"$env:CEP_DIR\CSXS\")) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path \"$env:CEP_DIR\CSXS\" } Copy-Item -Path \"build\*\" -Destination $env:CEP_DIR -Recurse -Force; Copy-Item -Path \"config\CSXS\manifest.xml\" -Destination \"$env:CEP_DIR\CSXS\\\" -Force; Write-Host \"Extension deployed to CEP directory\" }"
scripts.remove-from-cep: powershell -Command "& { $env:CEP_DIR = \"$env:APPDATA\Adobe\CEP\extensions\com.letterblack.genai\"; if (Test-Path $env:CEP_DIR) { Remove-Item -Path $env:CEP_DIR -Recurse -Force; Write-Host \"Extension removed from CEP directory\" } else { Write-Host \"Extension not found in CEP directory\" } }"
scripts.enable-cep-debug: powershell -Command "& { Set-ItemProperty -Path \"HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Adobe\CSXS.11\" -Name \"PlayerDebugMode\" -Value 1 -Force; Set-ItemProperty -Path \"HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Adobe\CSXS.12\" -Name \"PlayerDebugMode\" -Value 1 -Force; Write-Host \"CEP Debug mode enabled\" }"
scripts.archive: echo 'Creating backup...' && cp -r . ../Adobe_AI_Generations_backup_$(date +%Y%m%d) || echo 'Manual backup recommended'

author: pravesh.pandey@letterblack.ae
